tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Learn about the features provided by OCI Document Understanding Service

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Configure OCI Document Understanding policies
tutorials.description: Set up policies to use Document Understanding

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Use OCI Document Understanding in the Console
Lab 3: Use OCI Document Understanding via REST APIs
Lab 4: Use OCI Document Understanding with the OCI Python SDK
